title: Ironman Guide/Mining

properties.value: Mining is trained by ironmen as normal. In addition to the normal training methods, players will need to mine volcanic ash for making ultracompost and gem rocks for making expeditious bracelets at some point.

content:
Ironman Guide
This article or section requires a cleanup in order to meet the Old School RuneScape Wiki's quality standards.
You can edit this page to improve it.

Mining is trained by ironmen as normal. In addition to the normal training methods, players will need to mine volcanic ash for making ultracompost and gem rocks for making expeditious bracelets at some point.

Pickaxes up to rune can be bought from Nurmof's Pickaxe Shop. A dragon pickaxe can only be obtained as a rare drop from Chaos Elemental, Callisto, Venenatis and Vet'ion, or as a very rare drop from King Black Dragon.

Contents

  • 1 Early training: Quests
  • 2 Fastest experience
    • 2.1 Levels 15–45: Iron ore
    • 2.2 Levels 45–99: 3-tick mining granite
  • 3 Other methods
    • 3.1 Levels 61–99: Iron ore
    • 3.2 Levels 35–99: Sandstone
    • 3.3 Levels 55–99: Motherlode Mine
    • 3.4 Levels 85–99: Volcanic Mine

Early training: Quests[edit | edit source]

Main article: Quest experience rewards § Mining

Early levels can be skipped by completing a few quests. Notably, Plague City has no requirements and grants enough experience for level 15. Completing the following will reach level 34.

  • Doric's Quest rewards 1,300xp
  • Plague City rewards 2,425xp
  • The Lost Tribe requires Goblin Diplomacy, Rune Mysteries, 13 , 13 , 17 , rewards 3,000xp
  • The Dig Site requires 10 , 10 , 25 , rewards 15,300xp

Fastest experience[edit | edit source]

Levels 15–45: Iron ore[edit | edit source]

Mining iron rocks northeast of East Ardougne, at the Legends' Guild mine, using an Ardougne Cloak to teleport in front on the monastery offers, then running to the bank north-east of the zoo is the fastest experience until tick-manipulated granite becomes available. Players having trouble with tick manipulation can continue to mine iron in Ardougne or the mining guild.

Levels 45–99: 3-tick mining granite[edit | edit source]

3-tick mining granite rocks is the fastest mining experience in the game. It might be easier to start at a higher mining level, as it's harder to learn at the lower levels. While tick manipulating granite is a very hard method, it's well worth learning.

Other methods[edit | edit source]

Levels 61–99: Iron ore[edit | edit source]

With a dragon pickaxe, you can earn over 82,000 xp/hr in the Mining Guild by mining iron, since you can react to the rock depleting in 2 ticks, making it a decent alternative to granite.

Levels 35–99: Sandstone[edit | edit source]

Players can get a lot of Mining experience from mining sandstone, which can be exchanged for buckets of sand for Crafting training.

Levels 55–99: Motherlode Mine[edit | edit source]

Main article: Motherlode Mine

The Motherlode Mine becomes available at level 30, and moderately efficient at level 55. Players may wish to spend some time here to earn golden nuggets to exchange for the prospector kit and coal bag.

Levels 85–99: Volcanic Mine[edit | edit source]

Main article: Volcanic Mine

At level 85, the Volcanic Mine becomes viable. It's advisable to obtain the prospector kit beforehand.

rawContent:
{{Iron Guide Links}}
{{Cleanup}}

[[Mining]] is trained by ironmen as [[Pay-to-play Mining training|normal]]. In addition to the normal training methods, players will need to mine [[volcanic ash]] for making [[ultracompost]] and [[gem rock]]s for making [[expeditious bracelet]]s at some point.

Pickaxes up to [[Rune pickaxe|rune]] can be bought from [[Nurmof's Pickaxe Shop]]. A [[dragon pickaxe]] can only be obtained as a rare drop from [[Chaos Elemental]], [[Callisto]], [[Venenatis]] and [[Vet'ion]], or as a very rare drop from [[King Black Dragon]].

==Early training: Quests==
{{Main|Quest experience rewards#Mining}}

Early levels can be skipped by completing a few quests. Notably, [[Plague City]] has no requirements and grants enough experience for level 15. Completing the following will reach level 34.

* [[Doric's Quest]] rewards 1,300xp
* [[Plague City]] rewards 2,425xp
* [[The Lost Tribe]] requires [[Goblin Diplomacy]], [[Rune Mysteries]], {{SCP|Agility|13}}, {{SCP|Thieving|13}}, {{SCP|Mining|17}}, rewards 3,000xp
* [[The Dig Site]] requires {{SCP|Agility|10}}, {{SCP|Herblore|10}}, {{SCP|Thieving|25}}, rewards 15,300xp

==Fastest experience==
===Levels 15–45: Iron ore===
Mining [[iron rock]]s northeast of [[East Ardougne]], at the [[Legends' Guild mine]], using an [[Ardougne cloak|Ardougne Cloak]] to teleport in front on the monastery offers, then running to the bank north-east of the zoo is the fastest experience until tick-manipulated granite becomes available. Players having trouble with tick manipulation can continue to mine iron in Ardougne or the [[mining guild]]. 

===Levels 45–99: 3-tick mining granite===
[[Tick_manipulation#3-tick_Mining|3-tick mining]] [[granite rock]]s is the fastest mining experience in the game. It might be easier to start at a higher mining level, as it's harder to learn at the lower levels. While tick manipulating granite is a very hard method, it's well worth learning. 

==Other methods==

=== Levels 61–99: Iron ore ===
With a [[dragon pickaxe]], you can earn over 82,000 xp/hr in the Mining Guild by mining iron, since you can react to the rock depleting in 2 ticks, making it a decent alternative to granite.

===Levels 35–99: Sandstone===
Players can get a lot of Mining experience from mining [[sandstone]], which can be exchanged for [[Bucket of sand|buckets of sand]] for Crafting training.

===Levels 55–99: Motherlode Mine===
{{Main|Motherlode Mine}}
The Motherlode Mine becomes available at level 30, and moderately efficient at level 55. Players may wish to spend some time here to earn [[golden nugget]]s to exchange for the [[prospector kit]] and [[coal bag]].

===Levels 85–99: Volcanic Mine===
{{Main|Volcanic Mine}}
At level 85, the Volcanic Mine becomes viable. It's advisable to obtain the [[prospector kit]] beforehand.
